name: Fruits Bomb
description:
Make juicy lines of 3 or more adorable fruits. Bomb around hundreds of uniquely perplexing levels in this amazing puzzle adventure.

Immerse yourself into this yummy Fruits Bomb where garden strawberry, green apple, fresh blueberry, juicy orange and delicious grapes are everywhere. Bomb your way out and enjoy the fun of addictive match 3!

Fruits Bomb Features
- Popular and addictive match-3 gameplay
- Cute and juicy fruit graphics
- Whip your way through Fruits House, Fruits Castle, Fruits Factory
- Break up all breads, chocolate and ice to pass levels
- Stock up on chestnuts, mushrooms to bomb through fruity maps
- Get social! Challenge and compete with your friends inside the game and get rewarded!

All fruits lovers! Download Fruits Bomb and collect juicy fruits NOW!!
